Generation IX.Scarlet: It is said that a dog Pokémon that died in the wild without ever interacting with a human was reborn as this Pokémon.
Generation IX.Violet: This friendly Pokémon doesn't like being alone. Pay it even the slightest bit of attention, and it will follow you forever.

Generation IX.Scarlet: West Province: Area Three North Province: Dalizapa Passage , Glaseado Mountain Tera Raid Battles ( 1★ )
Generation IX.Violet: West Province: Area Three North Province: Dalizapa Passage , Glaseado Mountain Tera Raid Battles ( 1★ )
